lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Al Kamal Kamal Baas Layt Dhirai , Kaahoon Ayk Padam Kai Sanpat Samaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a bumble bee hops from one lotus flower to -another, but sucking nectar from anyone flower at the time of Sunset, it gets arrested in its box-like petals,

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy pMCI ibrK ibrK Pl Kwq iPrY brhny ibrK bYTy rjnI ibhwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Panchhee Birakh Birakh Dhal Khaat Dhirai , Barahanay Birakh Baitthay Rajanee Bihaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a bird keeps hoping from one tree to the other eating all types of fruits but spends night on a branch of any tree,

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qO bRXwpwrI hwit hwit kY dyKq iPrY ibrlY kI hwit bYT bnj ly jwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Byaapaaree Haati Haati Kai Daykhat Dhirai , Biralai Kee Haati Baitth Banaj Lay Jaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a trader keeps seeing commodities in every shop but purchases goods from anyone of them,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hI gur sbd rqn Kojq KojI koit mDy kwhU sMg rMg lptwq hY ]589]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Hee Gur Sabad Ratan Khojat Khojee , Koti Madhay Kaahoo Sang Rang Lapataat Hai ?589?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, the seeker of jewel-like Guru's words searches the jewel mine-the True Guru. Amongst many fake Gurus, there is a rare saintly person in whose holy feet a liberation seeker absorbs his mind. (He searches for the True Guru, obtains the elixir of
